channel.title: GNU Tar question from newb
channel.description:
Hey!
If I were to install whonix from scratch using the KVM way.
I read the guide and it says the best way to extract is by using GNU Tar.
Am I right this is a software i need to download?
If it is how do I launch the software and what commands would I run within it to extract the content of the xz file to the home dir?
Thanks

item.title: GNU Tar question from newb
item.dc:creator: MrKaos
item.description:
Hey SilentBob the Tar command worked fine after a complete reinstall of debian and kvm. Thanks for the help.

Read full topic

item.title: GNU Tar question from newb
item.dc:creator: SilentBob
item.description:
You should not need to download tar if you are using a Linux distro.

The instructions on this page show the commands you should use to extract the KVM images.

Whonix – 30 Sep 21

Whonix ™ for KVM

Using Whonix ™ with KVM (Kernel Virtual Machine)

Read full topic
